channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom for Windows Client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom for Windows Client

item.title: CVE-2023-34120|2024-09-19T19:32:54.852Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20for%20windows%20client
item.description: Improper privilege management in Zoom for Windows, Zoom Rooms for Windows, and Zoom VDI for Windows clients before 5.14.0 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable an escalation of privilege via local access. Users may potentially utilize higher level system privileges maintained by the Zoom client to spawn processes with escalated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-28601|2024-09-19T19:22:30.273Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20for%20windows%20client
item.description: Zoom for Windows clients prior to 5.14.0 contain an improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer vulnerability. A malicious user may alter protected Zoom Client memory buffer potentially causing integrity issues within the Zoom Client.
